articles.author: Jim Vejvoda
articles.title: Elvis Team: "Credit Needs to Be Given" to Rock & Roll's Black Pioneers - IGN
articles.description: The specter of cultural appropriation still looms large over Elvis Presley and his legacy. Director Baz Luhrmann and the cast of Elvis understand this, and so the film directly addresses the influence Black culture and music had on him.
articles.content:
Elvis was a hero to most/But he never meant shit to me you see/Straight up racist that sucker was/Simple and plain/Motherfuck him and John Wayne. Public Enemy, Fight the Power.
